upgrade.0: Grants a Bond of Life equal to 25% of Max HP when a Charged Attack hits an opponent. This effect can be triggered up to once every 14s. In addition, when the equipping character has a Bond of Life, they gain a 12% DMG Bonus; if the value of the Bond of Life is greater than or equal to 30% of Max HP, then gain an additional 24% DMG Bonus.
upgrade.1: Grants a Bond of Life equal to 25% of Max HP when a Charged Attack hits an opponent. This effect can be triggered up to once every 14s. In addition, when the equipping character has a Bond of Life, they gain a 16% DMG Bonus; if the value of the Bond of Life is greater than or equal to 30% of Max HP, then gain an additional 32% DMG Bonus.
upgrade.2: Grants a Bond of Life equal to 25% of Max HP when a Charged Attack hits an opponent. This effect can be triggered up to once every 14s. In addition, when the equipping character has a Bond of Life, they gain a 20% DMG Bonus; if the value of the Bond of Life is greater than or equal to 30% of Max HP, then gain an additional 40% DMG Bonus.
upgrade.3: Grants a Bond of Life equal to 25% of Max HP when a Charged Attack hits an opponent. This effect can be triggered up to once every 14s. In addition, when the equipping character has a Bond of Life, they gain a 24% DMG Bonus; if the value of the Bond of Life is greater than or equal to 30% of Max HP, then gain an additional 48% DMG Bonus.
upgrade.4: Grants a Bond of Life equal to 25% of Max HP when a Charged Attack hits an opponent. This effect can be triggered up to once every 14s. In addition, when the equipping character has a Bond of Life, they gain a 28% DMG Bonus; if the value of the Bond of Life is greater than or equal to 30% of Max HP, then gain an additional 56% DMG Bonus.

upgrade.0: 重击命中敌人时，赋予生命值上限25%的生命之契，该效果每14秒至多触发一次。此外，装备者具有生命之契时，造成的伤害提升12%；若生命之契的数值大于等于生命值上限的30%，造成的伤害将进一步提升24%。
upgrade.1: 重击命中敌人时，赋予生命值上限25%的生命之契，该效果每14秒至多触发一次。此外，装备者具有生命之契时，造成的伤害提升16%；若生命之契的数值大于等于生命值上限的30%，造成的伤害将进一步提升32%。

upgrade.3: 重击命中敌人时，赋予生命值上限25%的生命之契，该效果每14秒至多触发一次。此外，装备者具有生命之契时，造成的伤害提升24%；若生命之契的数值大于等于生命值上限的30%，造成的伤害将进一步提升48%。
upgrade.4: 重击命中敌人时，赋予生命值上限25%的生命之契，该效果每14秒至多触发一次。此外，装备者具有生命之契时，造成的伤害提升28%；若生命之契的数值大于等于生命值上限的30%，造成的伤害将进一步提升56%。

upgrade.0: 重撃が敵に命中すると、HP上限の25%の命の契約を付与する。この効果は14秒毎に1回のみ発動可能。また、装備者が命の契約を有しているとき、与えるダメージ+12%。命の契約の数値がHP上限の30%以上の場合、与えるダメージがさらに+24%。
